Models.name: BPS C1 - 5 currencies
Models.description: Version with 5 currencies including Fitness Sorting and SNR

Models.name: BPS C1 - 10 currencies
Models.description: Version with 10 currencies including Fitness Sorting and SNR

Models.name: BPS C1s - 5 currencies (alternative)
Models.description: Version with 5 currencies including Fitness Sorting and SNR

Models.name: BPS C1s - 10 currencies (alternative)
Models.description: Version with 10 currencies including Fitness Sorting and SNR

Models.name: BPS C1s - 32 currencies
Models.description: Version with 32 currencies including Fitness Sorting, SNR and Ticket reading

Ticket reading.name: [BPSC1] Ticket reading
Ticket reading.description: Reads casino available ticket formats and sends data to connected PC (PC not part of delivery)

Cheque reading.name: [BPSC1] Cheque reading
Cheque reading.description: Reads available cheque formats and sends data to connected PC (PC not part of delivery)

External display.name: [BPSC1] External display - 2 rows
External display.description: Shows counting results to the customer through the teller window (2 rows, red LED)

External display.name: [BPSC1] External display - 3 rows
External display.description: Shows counting results to the customer through the teller window (3 rows, green LED, stand)

High speed thermal printer.name: [BPSC1] High speed thermal printer
High speed thermal printer.description: Print out of serial no. Images and OCR as well as ticket barcode reading

License key creation.name: [BPSC1] License key creation
License key creation.description: In case a license key is required for change or addition of features and/or currencies
